<h1 align="center">
  Kibana 8.0 Navigation Prototype
</h1>
<h2 align="center">
  Built using Elastic's Gatsby EUI Starter
</h2>

## ðŸš€ Running locally

1.  **Yarn**

    Ensure you have yarn installed

1.  **Start developing.**

    Navigate the the directory

    ```sh
    cd kibana-8-nav/
    gatsby develop
    ```

1.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    The site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!

    _Note: You'll also see a second link: _`http://localhost:8000/___graphql`_. This is a tool you can use to experiment with querying your data. Learn more about using this tool in the [Gatsby tutorial](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/tutorial/part-five/#introducing-graphiql)._

    Open the `kibana-8-nav` directory in your code editor of choice and edit `src/pages/index.js`. Save your changes and the browser will update in real time!

1. **Deploy the site**

    If you've made changes to the site and want to replace the live/production version:

    1. Deploy with `yarn deploy`
    1. Access the site at https://ela.st/k8
